agents.name: Research Assistant
agents.description: An agent that helps with research tasks, including web searches, summarization, and citation management.
agents.author: Sai Sunkara

agents.name: Code Assistant
agents.description: An agent that helps with coding tasks, including code generation, debugging, and optimization.
agents.author: Sai Sunkara

agents.name: Data Analyst
agents.description: An agent that helps with data analysis tasks, including data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis.
agents.author: Sai Sunkara

agents.name: Writing Assistant
agents.description: An agent that helps with writing tasks, including grammar checking, style suggestions, and content generation.
agents.author: Sai Sunkara

agents.name: Math Tutor
agents.description: An agent that helps with mathematics, including step-by-step problem solving, concept explanations, and practice problems.
agents.author: Sai Sunkara
